episode.title: Live From WWDC 2022
episode.rawTitle: 349: ‘Live From WWDC 2022’, With Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guests Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak join me to discuss the news from WWDC 2022, in front of a live audience at the new Apple Developer Center at Apple Park.
episode.showNotes:
Special guests Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak join me to discuss the news from WWDC 2022, in front of a live audience at the new Apple Developer Center at Apple Park.

Sponsored by:

  • MacStadium: Private Mac clouds built by developers, for developers.
  • Atoms: The ideal everyday shoe.

Links:

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
